title: 🤖 AI FAQ Assistant
subtitle: Ask me anything about our content and subscription plans!
welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm here to help you with questions about our content and subscription plans. What would you like to know?
defaultResponse:
I'd be happy to help! For specific questions not covered in our FAQ, please contact our support team at support@company.com or try rephrasing your question. 

You can also ask about:
• Subscription plans and pricing
• Available content
• Billing information
• Account management

quickQuestions.question: What is the format of the content being offered ?
How can I access the content ?
I am a support person, and wish to switch to developer, will this course help me ?

subscription plans.answer:
We offer three subscription plans:

🌟 **Basic Plan** - $9.99/month
• Access to standard content library
• Mobile app access
• Email support

💎 **Premium Plan** - $19.99/month
• Everything in Basic
• Premium exclusive content
• HD streaming
• Priority support

🚀 **Pro Plan** - $29.99/month
• Everything in Premium
• Early access to new content
• Offline downloads
• 24/7 phone support

content included.answer:
Our content library includes:

📚 **Educational Content**
• Video tutorials and courses
• Interactive workshops
• Downloadable resources

🎵 **Entertainment**
• Music streaming
• Podcasts and audiobooks
• Exclusive shows

📰 **News & Articles**
• Daily news updates
• Industry insights
• Expert analysis

Content varies by subscription tier - Premium and Pro members get access to exclusive content!

billing.answer:
💳 **Billing Information:**

• Monthly billing on the same date each month
• Automatic renewal unless cancelled
• Accepted payments: Credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay
• Invoices sent via email
• Refunds available within 30 days

For billing issues, contact our support team at billing@company.com

free trial.answer:
🆓 **Free Trial Details:**

• 14-day free trial for new users
• Full access to Premium features
• No credit card required to start
• Cancel anytime during trial
• Automatic conversion to paid plan after trial

Start your free trial today and explore everything we have to offer!

cancel subscription.answer:
To cancel your subscription:

1. 📱 Log into your account
2. ⚙️ Go to Account Settings
3. 💳 Click on 'Billing & Subscriptions'
4. ❌ Select 'Cancel Subscription'
5. ✅ Confirm cancellation

Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period. You can also contact our support team for assistance!
